偝字的基本解释

偝
bèi
古同“背”。

偝字的汉语字典释义

[①]［bèi］
［《廣韻》蒲昧切，去隊，並。］
“背1”的古字。
(1)背向着。
(2)背弃；违反。

偝字的康熙字典解释

【子集中】【人字部】　偝； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页111第01
【廣韻】【集韻】?蒲昧切，音佩。棄也。【禮·坊記】利祿先死者，而後生者，則民不偝。　又【禮·投壺】毋偝立。【註】偝立，不正鄕前也。　又【荀子·非相篇】鄕則不若，偝則謾之。或作倍。亦作背。

偝字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
偝字的起名意思

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［bèi］
["Guang Yun" Pu Maiqie, go to the team, and. ]
The ancient character of "Back 1".

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Subset] [Human Character Department] 　偝; Kangxi Strokes: 11; Page Number: Page 111 01
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Pu Meiqie, sound Pei. Abandon also. 【Ritual·Fangji】Lilu who died first, and those who survived, the people are not alone.　[Li·Throw the pot] Don’t stand alone. [Note] Standing alone, not right in front of you.　[Xunzi·Feixiang Pian] 鄕 is not if, 偝 is idiot. Or make times. Also used as a back.
